name: Ebix Health
overview: Ebix Health provides technology solutions for employee benefits management. It offers LuminX, an automated system designed for organizations to administer health and other employee benefits. The company provides Absence Management LX, which includes short-term disability and long-term disability blocks that provide eligibility, billing and remittance of claims, integrated document scanning and storage, and remote access; and Consumer LX solution to manage flexible spending accounts, health reimbursement accounts, and health savings accounts. Its products also include Dental/Vision LX solution to handle the administration of dental and vision coverage; Health LX to handle the eligibility, adjudication, billing, and remittance of claims in various health insurance plans; and Insurance LX solution that includes group life, and accidental death and disbursement products. In addition, the company offers Web tools, such as online enrollment; advanced reporting and business intelligence; accounting capabilities; plan modeling capabilities; integrated technologies; and outsourcing services. It serves insurance carriers, health plans, third party administrators, plan sponsors, brokers, and self-administered organizations. The company has strategic partnerships with AdminiSource; Bloodhound; Captiva; CareVu; Coalition America, Inc.; Emdeon Business Services; Evolution Benefits, Inc.; Ingenix; JMS & Associates; MBI Benefits; MCFG; NHBC; Preferred Medical Claim Solutions; PHX; PPHA; SOCRATES, INC.; TC3; and The Phia Group, LLC. Ebix Health was formerly known as Acclamation Systems, Inc. and changed its name to Ebix Health in August 2008. Ebix Health was founded in 1989 and is based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. As of August 1, 2008, Ebix Health operates as a subsidiary of Ebix Inc.
